## windowEnvironmentInitializer() function

registers a message handler inside the electron main process, which will respond to communication messages coming from the `browserWindow`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function windowEnvironmentInitializer({
  browserWindow,
  env: { env: envName },
  communication: com,
}: BrowserWindowEnvironmentInitializerOptions): InitializedBrowserEnvironment;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter                                                    | Type                                                                                                               | Description |
| ------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------- |
| { browserWindow, env: { env: envName }, communication: com } | [BrowserWindowEnvironmentInitializerOptions](./engine-electron-node.browserwindowenvironmentinitializeroptions.md) |             |

<b>Returns:</b>

[InitializedBrowserEnvironment](./engine-electron-node.initializedbrowserenvironment.md)
